citations.narrative:
** One enclosure housing one non-human primate measured twenty-five inches tall, the enclosure must be at least thirty
inches tall. The enclosure must be modified, or replaced to be compliant with the regulation and provide for the health and
well-being of the animal. To be corrected by: 04-15-2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
